Dear Dallas: ^
Your recent letter to Irv Merrill makes me realise that
you never were officially notified of your appointment to the
NAEB Research Committee. You were included in the roster of
this Committee which I originally sent to Chairman Becker,
but somehow in transmitting the information on all the committee
members to headquarters your name was inadvertently omitted.
Anyway, it’s good to see you're already working as a member
of the Committee and snaking your usual valuable contributions.
This note, then, is just to provide official recognition of a

ciation for your willingness to serve.
